attributes.action: Give Tom Moore a Knighthood for contribution to the realm in a time of crisis.
attributes.additional_details: Push for the knighthood as soon as possible.
attributes.background: Please let this fantastic example of a gentleman be awarded the highest honour possible. More than once in his life he has gone above and beyond the call of duty for the nation and for that reason we should honour him appropriately.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
